name: gitreleasemanager-addasset
description: Tool for creating and exporting releases for software applications hosted on GitHub
author: GitTools Contributors

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: The access token to access GitHub with
inputs.helpMarkDown: The access token to access GitHub with

inputs.name: assets
inputs.label: Path(s) to the file(s) to include in the release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path(s) to the file(s) to include in the release. Separated by newline

inputs.name: targetDirectory
inputs.label: The directory on which GitReleaseManager should be executed. Defaults to current directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory on which GitReleaseManager should be executed. Defaults to current directory
